
set metadata include
set notation binary
set format e64
append "../EngineRuntime-MacOSX/*" rec
set user 1
append "tools_macosx/*"
set user 2
append "test_macosx/*"
set user 3
select name "*.DS_Store"
exclude
select name "*._*"
exclude
select name "*_build*"
exclude
invert
set quality e
set block 0x10000
set chain lzw huffman
set time c unset
set time a unset
set time m unset
finish
